name: Tracy's Spooky Kart Challenge
description:
Description

Play as Tracy, who drives their box-car down a hill and tries to avoid evil ghosts.  Will Tracy be able to make it out or will the ghosts take them to their doom?

Gameplay

  • The player controls a go-cart, a “kart”. The arrow-keys or WASD are used for turning and accelerating as well as reversing the kart.
  • The player can make the kart jump, to avoid obstacles or to perform stunts in order to navigate the track. This action is performed with the SPACE-key.
  • The player should avoid obstacles to be able to finish the track.
  • The game uses a 3rd person camera, following the kart.
  • The track has obstacles that the player must avoid to be able to finish the track. 
  • Falling off a ledge into nothingness will reset the kart to the starting point.
  • When the player reaches the finish line, the game ends. Showing an end-game animation
